articles.title: Coco Gauff urges Emma Raducanu to be cautious of the dangers of social media - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 18-year-old, who now has two million followers on Instagram, stunned the tennis world when she stormed to the women's singles title in New York as a qualifier and without dropping a set.
articles.content:
